channel.title: Welcome to He Zhao's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content on Welcome to He Zhao's Homepage

item.description: About Me: I am a Ph.D. student in Faculty of Information Technology, Monash University, supervised by Dr. Lan Du and Prof. Wray Buntine, since late 2015. I received my M.Eng from Nanjing University in 2014 and B.Eng from Nankai University in 2011. I am interested in statistical machine learning. Currently I am working on Bayesian matrix/tensor factorisations with discrete data (e.g. documents and relational networks). I am also interested in other related areas such as Bayesian nonparametrics, sampling/inference algorithms, and deep generative models.
